text: D'Andre Tiyon Swift (born January 14, 1999) is an American football player for the Detroit Lions of the National Football League (NFL). He plays the running back position. Before entering the NFL, he played for the Georgia Bulldogs football team, a college team in Georgia. He was selected in the second round of the 2020 NFL Draft. ==NFL statistics== Year Team Games Rushing Receiving Fumbles GP GS Att Yds Avg Lng TD Rec Yds Avg Lng TD FUM Lost 2020 DET 13 4 114 521 4.6 54 8 46 357 7.8 26 2 3 2 2021 DET 9 2 123 419 3.41 16 3 50 420 8.4 63 2 1 1 Total 22 6 237 940 4.0 54 11 96 777 8.1 63 4 4 3 Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Detroit Lions players Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia
